1.content: You hear your girlfriend yell at you to wake up and as you get up off the cardboard you were ordered to sleep on as punishment she holds out two pairs of panties and you have to pick what pair you are wearing
1.title: wake up slave!

11.content: You grab the pink frilly ones and quickly put the on. She then kisses you and then knees you in the nuts
11.title: pink frilly ones

111.content:
Your girlfriend gives you a hearty laugh. "You are so cute when I'm abusing you!" she remarks.

"I'm cute?" you say.

"Yes, you are, dear." Your girlfriend playfully (or at least, her definition of "playfully") punches your shoulder.

Even though you are in huge pain, you are still smiling. You tell her,
111.title: she laughs

1111.content:
Your girlfriend hit you harder and you easily and she started to laugh again and commented on how you are also cute when you are trying to act manly.
She gets silent for a second and then she says "I know how to make you look more manly"
You start to ask how ?
She answers "first you will need to choose between option A or the option B"
1111.title: "Hit me harder!"

11111.content:
You don't know what you were expecting when she asked you and you ended up wearing a dress.
The dress is a frilly pink one with a lot of ribbons and she even blonde wig.
"How this will make me more manly" you asked.
"You could have asked that before wearing it but now stay still so I can do your make up"
Well you knew that she would still force you to wear it and now you continue to do what she tells you.
After sometime...
"There we are done!" she says "Here is the mirror so you can see yourself"
As you look in the mirror you only see a girl looking back at you.
She gives you knee high socks and low heels to wear and they she says
11111.title: Frilly dress

111111.content:
As you step toward the door nervously she stops and point out that she forgot something
She comes back with a collar with leash and a hairband with pink cat or dog ears (you aren't sure which)
She ask you to put them on but you refuse and she force them on you.
And both of you gets out.
As you walk with her you realize that the ears you are wearing are ....
111111.title: "Let's go to play out"

1111111.content:
For unknown reasons you realize that it is a cat ears.
As you walk with your girlfriend you met few people that she knows and she would always introduce you as her boyfriend to make sure they know you're a boy at first you were scared of it but after while you got used to it.
Your girlfriend got surprised that you seem more confident than usual and girlier ?
You go back to her room and she asks you to pose for her you refuse as first but she tries to force you
And you....
1111111.title: Cat Eae force

11111111.content:
You refuse to pose for your girlfriend and she failed to force you to do it.
And she starts to wonder why you suddenly became so strong willed "is it because of the cat ears?" she mumbles you act like you didn't hear her though.
After few years you are married to your girlfriend
She works to bring money for the house while you rule the house as the cat girl "wife" you are
She treats you like her queen and worship you.
You were blessed with a baby girl and now you are raising her to be as strong and feminine as you.
11111111.title: A strong dependable "female"

11111112.content:
As always you do as she wills and start to pose for her and she takes photos amd posted them online.
After few weeks you got offer to be a singing idol cat girl and your girlfriend made you sign it up.
And afterwards you got to be a famous singer and your girlfriend still somehow supports you but you are mostly away from her.
You also got many fans and acted in many movies (as girl).
And after few years you broke up with your girlfriend because she always bullied you and now you are married to your manager (although none of your fans or media knows that yet) who treats you like her little princess although she is more muscline than your previous girlfriend.
And you live with her happly ever after .....until media found out maybe
11111112.title: Submit to her

1111112.content:
As you are walking with her you realize that these are supposed to be dog ears
Because she is literally treating you as her pet dog girl.
But for some reason you seem to like it and you even start to bring out your tongue to act like a dog.
And after many years you are still her pet dog girl although now you don't need a wig and is more obedient.
And you live with her happly ever after or so she says.
1111112.title: Fate of the doggy

1112.content: "You're ticklish, huh?" your girlfriend says. "Well, then..."
1112.title: "Stop it, that tickles!"

choices: "You have to wear my clothes for an entire year."
1113.content:
"I know you love me," your girlfriend says as she pats your head, since she is three inches taller than you. "And I want you to prove your love."

"How shall I prove my love, beautiful?" you ask her.

Your girlfriend answers,
1113.title: "I love you!"

choices: tell her that you are not ready
11132.content:
"You're not afraid of commitment, are you?" your girlfriend asks you.

You...
11132.title: "Marry me."

info.brief_description: You are tall about 6'0 but your girlfriend is 6'3".
info.description: You are a guy who is 6'0" and your girlfriend is 6'3". You are her slave as she is much stronger than you. She tells you what to wear and tortures you. You love this. She has black hair and a thin physique but still stronger
